grant-table.active-tokens: Number of currently active access tokens
grant-table.no-sites: You have not approved any sites.
grant-table.no-whitelisted: You have not accessed any whitelisted sites.
grant-table.pre-approved: These are sites that have been pre-approved by an administrator.
grant-table.text: These are sites you have approved manually. If the same site asks for the same access in the future, it will be granted without prompting.
grant-table.whitelist-note: NOTE: If you revoke them here, they will automatically be re-approved on your next visit wthout prompting.
grant-table.whitelisted-site: This site was whitelisted by an adminstrator
